smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (minTS - mWeekTimestamp == WEEK_SECONDS.toLong()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minTS - mWeekTimestamp == WEEK_SECONDS.toLong()
Parentheses in (mLastHash != 0L && !checkedEvents) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mLastHash != 0L && !checkedEvents
Parentheses in (Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)
Parentheses in (Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)
Parentheses in ((daysCnt - firstProperDay) / 7) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (daysCnt - firstProperDay) / 7

Parentheses in (activity.layoutInflater.inflate(R.layout.dialog_select_calendars, null) as ViewGroup) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: activity.layoutInflater.inflate(R.layout.dialog_select_calendars, null) as ViewGroup
Parentheses in (event.startDayIndex / 7) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: event.startDayIndex / 7
Parentheses in (!startDay.isThisMonth && !endDay.isThisMonth) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !startDay.isThisMonth && !endDay.isThisMonth
Parentheses in (dimPastEvents && event.isPastEvent) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dimPastEvents && event.isPastEvent
Parentheses in (!startDay.isThisMonth && !endDay.isThisMonth) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !startDay.isThisMonth && !endDay.isThisMonth
Parentheses in (dimPastEvents && event.isPastEvent) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dimPastEvents && event.isPastEvent
Parentheses in (dimPastEvents && it.isPastEvent) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dimPastEvents && it.isPastEvent
Parentheses in (minutes * minSecs) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minutes * minSecs
Parentheses in (hours * hourSecs) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: hours * hourSecs
Parentheses in (days * daySecs) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: days * daySecs
Parentheses in (weeks * weekSecs) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: weeks * weekSecs
